content.question: The unemployment rate is calculated as

choices.label: the number of people not working divided by the population
the number of people not working divided by the number of people working both full-time and part-time
the number of people working part-time but actively seeking full-time employment divided by the number of people in the labor force
the number of people not working but actively seeking employment divided by the number of people in the labor force
the number of people in the labor force divided by the population

content.answer: the number of people not working but actively seeking employment divided by the number of people in the labor force

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
